snippet: The prolific blogger wrote that he thought that "the only truly solid future for online journalism'' is to get readers to pay for content, and eschewed advertising revenue because it was "distracting and intrusive.''
abstract: The prolific blogger wrote that he thought that "the only truly solid future for online journalism'' is to get readers to pay for content, and eschewed advertising revenue because it was "distracting and intrusive.''

headline.main: Andrew Sullivan Leaving Daily Beast to Start Subscription Web Site
